"Hey there! I appreciate your honesty and straightforwardness in what you're looking for. I totally understand your position as a gray-asexual and demi-sexual person. A low frequency, long-term friendship with occasional cuddling benefits sounds like a unique and special connection. I respect your preference for exclusivity and being ambiamorous.

I understand that you prefer to focus on one conversation at a time and may not respond immediately, and that's completely okay. I appreciate your transparency and being upfront about your communication preferences. I'll make sure to keep that in mind and won't take it personally if you don't respond right away.

If we end up having a good connection, I'd be more than happy to meet more frequently and see where it takes us. Let's see if we can make a connection that works for both of us. How about we schedule a call soon and chat more in-depth?"
